title: Web and Graphic Designer for Marketing
job_overview:
Graphic & Web Design + Marketing Specialist (m/f/d)

We are looking for a creative all-rounder with a passion for design, marketing, and communication.

Your responsibilities:
– Design high-quality graphics and websites
– Develop and implement marketing visuals and campaigns
– Maintain brand consistency across all media

What we expect:
– Excellent English communication skills (written & verbal)
– Strong attention to detail in colors, layout, and visual harmony
– Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma or similar tools
– Experience with social media and online marketing is a plus

What we offer:
– Flexible work environment
– Creative freedom and impactful projects
– A motivated and friendly team

Apply now and bring your design ideas to life!
